dc_title_s: 1870 Beers Map of the City of Trenton, New Jersey
dc_description_s: A map of the city of Trenton, New Jersey from actual surveys by and under the direction of F. W. Beers. This extremely detailed map depicts building footprints, names of property owners, various land association developments, natural features and rail lines.|The document also includes a Subscribers Business Reference with professions and businesses by subject arranged in alphabetical order. In addition, there is a listing of owners by street and house number. |The map scale is 1" = 250'.
